disable_gpu[source]

disable_gpu()

disable gpu for tensorflow

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

limit_gpu[source]

limit_gpu(gpu_id:str, memory_limit:int)

limit the selected gpu [gpu_id] by [memory_limit] MB

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
limit_gpu(1, 1024*8)

No GPU:1 found in your system!
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
